courses.description: Basic instruction provided in English grammar, spelling, composition, literature, science, social studies, and mathematics. Course content is provided through multi-level classes and is designed to accommodate students with an assessed reading grade equivalent 8.9 or lower as determined by standardized testing.
See ABED001 on this page. Notes: 0 This course is not available for web registration.

Instruction and development of basic reading skills; vocabulary, word attack skills, word recognition, comprehension, and speed. Course content is provided through multi-level classes and is designed to accommodate students with an assessed reading grade equivalent of 8.9 or lower as determined by standardized testing. Course is intended to be taken in conjunction with a Basic Education class.
See ABED011 on this page. Notes: 0 This course is not available for web registration.
